loading.message1: As you level up, your damage, spell power, mana, and mana regeneration increase, making it easier to defeat bosses. To level up, try playing Time Trial, Challenge, Combo, or Boss Battle modes.
loading.message2: Your data is stored on this device. To prevent possible data loss, don’t forget to synchronize your data from the Profile menu.
loading.message3: Bugs Happen – We’re Here for You! If you encounter an issue or have ideas to help us improve, please let us know. Your feedback is essential. Thank you!
loading.message4: Spotted a translation mistake? While adapting the app into different languages, some errors might slip through. If you notice a mistranslation or odd term, don’t hesitate to tell us.
loading.message5: A new power awakens in the dark... Discover the new Invoker Persona by opening the Profile menu and tapping 'Invoker Persona'. Enhance your experience with unique voices and special icons.

commonGeneral.bestScoreByKill: Your best score by kill time

snackbarMessages.fillFields: Please fill out all required fields

snackbarMessages.errorSubmitScore1: You must be logged in to submit your score.
snackbarMessages.errorSubmitScore2: To submit your score, you need to beat your previous score.
snackbarMessages.succesSubmitScore: Your score has been sent successfully.
snackbarMessages.feedbackInfoMessage: Your message must be at least 10 characters.
snackbarMessages.feedbackSuccessMessage: Thank you! your feedback will help me improve your experience.
snackbarMessages.qwerHudInfoMessage1: Adjusts the height of the quas, wex, exort, and invoke buttons.
snackbarMessages.qwerHudInfoMessage2: The higher it is, the closer it is to the bottom.
snackbarMessages.syncDataSuccess: Your data has been successfully saved.
snackbarMessages.syncDataWait: You can perform synchronization every 5 minutes.

snackbarMessages.sbResetPw: A password reset request has been sent to your email. Please check your email.

snackbarMessages.sbSinglePurchase: This item can be purchased only once.

authErrorMessages.AuthWeakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
authErrorMessages.AuthEmailAlreadyInUse: The email address is already in use by another account.
authErrorMessages.AuthToManyRequests: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.

settings.playerInfoDesc: If there is no sound, change this setting.

feedback.fbMidText: Tell me how your experience was and let me know what I can improve.
feedback.fbHint: Drop me any suggestions, questions or complaints to improve :)

bossBattleInfo.noteDesc: Each level increases spell damage by 2%.

exitGameDialogMessages.body1: Legendary Invoker! The master of earth-shaking spells! You say you're about to leave the game. However, does a wizard disappear suddenly? Do you really want to leave this world, putting aside the spells cast? Or shall we stay in a world filled with a bit more magical touch?
exitGameDialogMessages.word1: Rest, recover, but it's crucial not to stay away from the magic of the world!
exitGameDialogMessages.body2: You've created wonders as a hero on the battlefield, but now it's time to decide. Is the decision to leave the game really what you want? If so, there's an open door for you. However, if you want more victories and moments filled with war, you can leave that door and stay here.
exitGameDialogMessages.word2: Time can't be reversed, but the world is waiting for you!
exitGameDialogMessages.body3: You're standing in the midst of the battle, saying you're about to leave the battlefield. If you want to give up this tough struggle, you must choose your path. Remember, victory sometimes requires not giving up. Perhaps victory is just one step further ahead. What do you want to do?
exitGameDialogMessages.word3: Take a breath, but remember that the story of your victory is not yet complete!

appUpdateDialog.message: Invoker, get ready! A surprise update is waiting for you. Update now and discover what's new in our magical world. We've enhanced the gaming experience with brand-new features and changes. Tap the update button and join this enchanting adventure!

Veil_of_discord.bonus:
Increases magic damage taken by bosses.
Duration: 16 Seconds

Kaya.bonus:
Mana Regen Amp +24%
Spell Damage Amp +8%

Hand_of_midas.bonus:
Gives 360 gold at the end of each round.
(Multiple items won't work!)

Meteor_hammer.bonus:
Deals damage to bosses over time.
Mana Regen Amp +50%
Spell Damage Amp +12%

Crystalys.bonus:
Gives a chance to deal a bonus damage critical strike.
Proc Chance 12%
Critical Damage 120%
Damage +24

Orchid.active:
10% of damage dealt over the item's duration converts to spell damage at the end.
Duration: 5 Seconds

Ethereal_blade.bonus:
(This item can be purchased only once!)
Mana +400
Mana Regen +3.0
Ethereal_blade.active:
Base Magical Damage 200
Magic Amplification +40%
Duration: 8 Seconds

Monkey_king_bar.bonus:
MKB has a chance to deal piercing damage.
Proc Chance 40%
Pierce Damage 35
Increases damage by 48

Refresher_orb.active:
Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
(Multiple items won't stacks)

Daedalus.bonus:
Gives a chance to deal a bonus damage critical strike.
Proc Chance 20%
Critical Damage 160%
Damage +56

Bloodthorn.active:
15% of damage dealt over the item's duration converts to spell damage at the end.
Magical Damage per Hit: 40
Duration: 5 Seconds

Aghanims_scepter.bonus:
Adds 3 levels to all abilities.
2x Sun Strike Damage
Mana +400
Damage +10
(Can be purchased once, takes no inventory space, and is non-refundable.)

Aghanims_shard.bonus:
EMP restores 225 mana.
Ghost Walk ability regenerates 10 mana per second for 15 seconds when no other ability or item is used.
(Can be purchased once, takes no inventory space, and is non-refundable.)

paywall.intro_text: Every spell is a choice. Every support is a step forward. This game is shaped by your choices. By supporting us, you not only contribute to the game’s development but also make your journey more rewarding.

features.feature_reach_max_level_desc: Instantly jump to the final level
features.feature_time_desc: Extra time in Time Trial mode

transaction_messages.purchase_success_desc: Thank you! Your purchase was successfully completed. Your product has been added to your account and is ready for use. We appreciate your support!
transaction_messages.transaction_initiated_desc: Your purchase request was successfully submitted. Once payment is confirmed, your product will be automatically added to your account. Thank you for your interest and support!
transaction_messages.purchase_failed_desc: The transaction could not be completed. An issue occurred during payment or the transaction was canceled. Please try again or use a different payment method.
